title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12 - Control Of Air Contaminants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12 - Control Of Air Contaminants

State Regulations

Subpart 12-1 - General Requirements (§ 12-1.1 to 12-1.12)

Subpart 12-2 - Specific Operations And Specific Control Requirements (§ 12-2.1 to 12-2.10)

Subpart 12-3 - Evidence Of Dangerous Air Contaminants (§ 12-3.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 12

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§27, 29, 200, 299

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
